breaking.author: XaF
breaking.cause: Even with a number of automations to handle the migration from `asdf` to `mise`, it is possible that at least one instance of `omni up` in any repository is required, and maybe even running `omni up` again in any repository where issues are encountered. Also, it is possible that some plugins were working right of the bat with `asdf` but might require specifying an `url:` when using with `mise`; urls for base plugins can be found in https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf-plugins. Closes https://github.com/XaF/omni/issues/830 Closes https://github.com/XaF/omni/issues/695

breaking.author: XaF
breaking.cause: casks that did not have the `cask` explicit mention in `up:` operations will stop working. Simple fix is to prefix them by `cask:` if the cask name is provided inline (e.g. `- 1password-cli` should become `- cask: 1password-cli`.
